T02TD3311E:10a-1: aa ra pa tsa na s'a dha nam /
T02TD3311E:10a-3: aa ra pa tsa na'i sgrub thabs //
T02TD3311E:10a-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3311E:10a-5: zla ba ltar dkar glegs bam ral gris phyag mtshan pa //
T02TD3311E:10a-6: shin tu mdzes shing mchog gi gzhon nu zung phud lnga //
T02TD3311E:10b-0: dga' mchog thar pa @10b rgyas shing padma'i 'dab 'dra'i spyan //
T02TD3311E:10b-1: blo ngan sreg mkhas 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3311E:10b-2: gang gis lo phyed rgyun mi 'chad par mngon bsgoms pas //
T02TD3311E:10b-3: skye bo aa ra pa tsa na ni nges 'grub 'gyur //
T02TD3311E:10b-4: dngos po ma lus rtogs pa'i byang chub mchog thob pa'i //
T02TD3311E:10b-5: rin chen 'khor lo'i man ngag shin tu bsdu bar bya //
T02TD3311E:10b-6: mnyam gtsang bsngags ba'i yid du 'ong ba'i sa yi char //
T02TD3311E:10b-7: dri zhim me tog gcal bkram spos chus chag chag gdab //
T02TD3311E:10b-8: la lar 'jam zhing yid 'ong stan la nyer gnas te //
T02TD3311E:10b-9: bde ba shin tu mtshan med byang chub sems bsgom bya //
T02TD3311E:10b-10: gsang sngags rang bzhin dag pa brjod nas ni //
T02TD3311E:10b-11: ma lus kun nas stong bar rnam bsgoms shing //
T02TD3311E:10b-12: dngos don don bcas dpag gi lus nyid kyang //
T02TD3311E:10b-13: de ni 'od gsal la mtha' ru lan gcig bsam //
T02TD3311E:10b-14: de nas bar snang rang nyid zla dkyil ni //
T02TD3311E:10b-15: dbyangs yig dang pos 'dod dang ldan pa bsgom //
T02TD3311E:10b-16: de bzhin 'dir ni shin tu dkar ba'i dh'i: //
T02TD3311E:10b-17: de ni 'jam dbyangs dri ma med par bsgom //
T02TD3311E:10b-18: zla ba bye ba'i 'od dang mtshungs pa la //
T02TD3311E:10b-19: rgyan rnams thams cad rab tu 'bar ba ste //
T02TD3311E:10b-20: chags bcas cung zad bzhad cing yid 'ong bar //
T02TD3311E:10b-21: bsam gtan mthar phyin padma'i steng bzhugs bsam //
T02TD3311E:10b-22: rang gi snying ga'i yi ge aa mchog ni //
T02TD3311E:10b-23: rnam par 'phro bar gyur ba legs bsams la //
T02TD3311E:10b-24: mnyam med 'od zer rnams kyi dra ba ste //
T02TD3311E:10b-25: 'khor lo'i rtsibs ni brgyad pa'i gzugs su bsam //
T02TD3311E:10b-26: de yi steng du zla ba'i gzugs nyid la //
T02TD3311E:10b-27: sngags pa yis ni de la bsgom bya ste //
T02TD3311E:10b-28: zla ba'i 'od ltar shin tu dkar ba yi //
T02TD3311E:10b-29: mgon po 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni de nyid do //
T02TD3311E:10b-30: g-yas su shin tu mdzes pa'i gzugs ldan pa //
T02TD3311E:10b-31: rnam par 'dzum zhing zur gyis lta ba dang //
T02TD3311E:10b-32: nu ma gnyis ni shin tu rgyas pa yi //
T02TD3311E:10b-33: skra can de la blta bar bsam par bya //
T02TD3311E:10b-34: g-yon logs su ni nye ba'i skra can ma //
T02TD3311E:10b-35: shin tu mdzes shing sgeg pa'i gzugs can ma //
T02TD3311E:10b-36: yon tan ma lus pa yi gter gyur pa'i //
T02TD3311E:10b-37: de gnyis tsa dang na las bsgom par bya //
T02TD3311E:10b-38: mdun du dran ba can 'od bsam pa ni //
T02TD3311E:10b-39: dri med rab dkar ra las byung ba nyid //
T02TD3311E:10b-40: zla 'od yid du 'ong zhing 'od ldan te //
T02TD3311E:10b-41: pa las byug ba rgyab tu gzhag par bya //
T02TD3311E:10b-42: yang na yi ge'i rab 'bar ba yi //
T02TD3311E:11a-2: des ni mi shes ri bo 'joms pa dang //
T02TD3311E:11a-3: ye shes dam pa rnyog pa med par byed //
T02TD3311E:11a-4: 'og tu 'khor lo myur du 'khor bsams la //
T02TD3311E:11a-5: gti mug mun nag ma lus rnam par sel //
T02TD3311E:11a-6: rang lha'i sku ni mi 'gyur nyid bsam shing //
T02TD3311E:11a-7: zla ba'i gzugs 'dra'i 'od zer dra ba che //
T02TD3311E:11a-8: zla 'dra'i 'od zer sprin ni rgya chen po //
T02TD3311E:11a-9: phyung nas phyogs bcur song zhing 'bar bsams la //
T02TD3311E:11a-10: bdag lus de bzhin sems can rnam brgyan te //
T02TD3311E:11a-11: 'ongs nas snying ga'i zla ba'i gzugs la bzhugs //
T02TD3311E:11a-12: de nas sngags mchog aa ra pa tsa na //
T02TD3311E:11a-13: sngags pa'i mchog gis legs par bzlas par bya //
T02TD3311E:11a-14: blo gros brtan pas man ngag ji bzhin du //
T02TD3311E:11a-15: bsgoms na myur du sa mchog rnams dang ni //
T02TD3311E:11a-16: dri med yid 'ong pha rol phyin kun dang //
T02TD3311E:11a-17: blo ngan nyes bcom rgyal ba thob par 'gyur //
T02TD3311E:11a-18: bla ma dam pa dga' rab rdo rje ni //
T02TD3311E:11a-19: dam pa'i chos rnams mchog gi mdzod gyur pa'i//
T02TD3311E:11a-20: bde bar gshegs pa'i tshogs kyi spyan snga ru //
T02TD3311E:11a-21: gang zhig cho ga bzhin du dbang bskur ba //
T02TD3311E:11a-22: blo gros bzang po mi pham bshes gnyen gyis //
T02TD3311E:11a-23: skye bo rnams kyi blo gros dag bya'i phyir //
T02TD3311E:11a-24: aa ra pa tsa na yi 'khor lo mchog / de yi gzhung du yang dag sbyar ba yin //
T02TD3311E:11a-25: 'khor lo'i cho ga'i mchog ni legs sbyar bas //
T02TD3311E:11a-26: bdag gis bsod nams rgya chen thob 'dus pas //
T02TD3311E:11a-27: gang des 'gro kun sdig pa las rgyal zhing //
T02TD3311E:11a-28: bde mtha' gcig tu 'jam dbyangs nyid gyur cig / aa ra pa tsa na'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po mi pham bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so //
T02TD3311E:11a-29: rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gu bha dang /
T02TD3311E:11a-30: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong rin chen bzang bos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
